name: Tower Drehfense
description:
Turn based was yesterday. Today, you turn your base to defend it against waves of light and dark enemies. And don't abandon all hope: You can actually win this game!

Created during the Austria Game Jam 2016
("Dreh" is Austrian word for "turn" in case you were wondering).

Gamplay Music from www.playonloop.com

Watch our gameplay video on youtube.

Created by

Andreas Friedl, @rohschinken
Andreas Unterbrunner
Florian Gnadlinger
Vivien Schreiber, @viesc
